pages.text: While this category contains an introduction to the various concepts of the game from a lore perspective, each individual category contains its own introduction describing each system in detail.$(br2)Some categories contain additional information on mechanics in a subcategory, which will be marked in $(bold)bold$() as $(bold)Subcategories$() on the left.

pages.title: Quick Start (Part 1)
pages.text: Roots can be begun by going through the following steps.$(li)Break grass until you obtain $(l:herbs/wildroot)wildroot$() and $(l:herbs/terra_moss)terra spores$(), read $(l:herbs/introduction)Introduction to Herbs$().$(li)Craft a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$() to harvest $(l:herbs/terra_moss)terra moss$() (see entry).$(li)$(bold)Either$() begin spellcasting:  craft a $(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle)mortar and pestle$(), $(l:crafting/staff)staff$(), $(l:crafting/gramary)gramary$() & $(l:crafting/imbuer)imbuer$() and reading $(l:spells/introduction)Introduction to Spells$().$(li)Then craft a $(l:crafting/herb_pouch)herb pouch$() or similar to store herbs in and allow you to cast spells.

pages.title: Quick Start (Part 2)
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Alternately$() begin rituals & crafting by making a $(l:crafting/pyres)pyre$() and reading the $(l:rituals/introduction)Introduction to Rituals$().$(li)Craft a $(l:crafting/grove_stone)grove stone$() and $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), then perform a $(l:rituals/ritual_grove_supplication)Grove Supplication$() ritual. Read $(l:crafting/introduction)Introduction to Crafting$().$(br2)Further progress is gated behind access to herbs (or materials). The following steps may be done in any order.

pages.title: Quick Start (Part 3)
pages.text: $(li)Use either the advancement 'All The Herbs 3' or entries in the $(cat:herbs)Herbs$() category to track your progress in unlocking herbs.$(li)Remember that herbs $(l:herbs/renewable_resources)are a renewable resource$(/l) and don't require you to constantly craft them through Pyre rituals.$(li)Craft an $(l:crafting/imposer)imposer and begin altering your spells$().$(li)Craft useful items, such as $(cat:crafting/living_tools)living tools$() or $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$().
